channel.title: New HighScores?
channel.description:
I copied Jagex's HighScores and edited them to show highscores via a MySQL database. I was wondering if I should replace Segadora's Highscores from my tutorials with this new template that's about 90% like Jagex's. We have shamelessly broken their copyright laws before by making private servers, Is it so different to release their web templates as well? You judge guys, I may just release them.
I'm sure you want to see what they look like. Main page in Adobe Dreamweaver.
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/w7kcu8.jpg[/img]
Personal page in Mozilla Firefox.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/b4evd2.jpg[/img]
I'm posting here and not in MITB(Seeing as MITB has a web design section) because this has to do with my highscores tutorials and weather or not I'll update them. If I'm wrong for posting this here, by all means move or lock.

item.title: New HighScores?
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:11, topic:332242”][quote author=Berky-Scape link=topic=428682.msg3161705#msg3161705 date=1269634145]

I’m honestly sick of people posting crap here just to show off. All of these “Should I release?” topics are really a load of bullshit and the user just wants other people to be jealous. If you’re gonna release it, release it without hesitation.

Yeah…
[/quote]
What do you mean ‘Yeah’? I released them already. Not trying to make anyone jealous.[/quote]
Released them? Where?
I see nothing.

Read full topic
